actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend section 333 of title 38, United States Code, to provide that veterans who serve 2 or more years in peacetime shall be entitled to a presumption that chronic diseases becoming manifest within 1 year from the date of separation from service are service connected.

summary.text: Provides that veterans who serve two or more years in peacetime shall be entitled to a presumption that the chronic disease which is 10 percent or more disabling and which becomes manifest within one year from the date of separation from service is service connected. (Amends 38 U.S.C. 333)

titles.title: A bill to amend section 333 of title 38, United States Code, to provide that veterans who serve 2 or more years in peacetime shall be entitled to a presumption that chronic diseases becoming manifest within 1 year from the date of separation from service are service connected.
